```{sql}
SELECT n.name, mi1.movie_id, n.gender, ci.role_id, mi1.info, mi2.info
FROM cast_info AS  ci
INNER JOIN name AS n ON n.id = ci.person_id 
INNER JOIN movie_info AS mi1 ON mi1.movie_id = ci.movie_id
INNER JOIN movie_info AS mi2 ON mi2.movie_id = ci.movie_id
WHERE ci.role_id = 8
AND mi1.info_type_id = 3 
AND mi2.info_type_id = 8 
AND mi2.info LIKE '%USA%'
GROUP BY ci.person_id
LIMIT 200;
```
